瑌瑌瑌

瑌字的基本解释

瑌
ruǎn
古同“碝”。

瑌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ruǎn］
［《廣韻》而兗切，上獮，日。］
似玉的美石。

瑌字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑌； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页737第06
【廣韻】而兗切【集韻】乳兗切，?音耎。石次玉者。【山海經】狀䐗之山，其上多瑌石。【郭註】白者如冰，半有赤色者。【史記·司馬相如傳】瑌石武夫。【註】石似玉。【漢書·音義】瑌石出鴈門。　又【廣韻】而緣切【集韻】而宣切，?音?。義同。　又【廣韻】瑌，珉也，玉佩也。【詩·鄭風】靑靑子佩。【傳】士佩瓀珉而靑組綬。【釋文】瓀，本又作瑌。　又【五音集韻】奴亂切，音偄。水濵地。一曰城下田。

瑌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
瑌字的起名意思

暂无。

Xuan
Basic explanation of words
Xuan
ruǎn
Gu Tong "Sui".
Xuan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ruǎn］
["Guangyun" and Yan cut, up and down, day. ]
Beautiful stone like jade.
Xuan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑌; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 737 06
[Guang Yun] and Yan cut [Ji Yun] Milk Yan cut, sound 耎. Shi Ciyu who. 【Shanhaijing】Mountain of Zhuangtuo, on which there are many 瑌石. [Guo's Note] The white is like ice, and the half is red. 【Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Biography】Tuanshi Takeo. [Note] Stone is like jade. [Han Shu·Sound and Meaning] The stone came out of Yanmen.　[Guangyun] and Yuanqie [Jiyun] and Xuanqie, "Yin". The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Yu, Min Ye, Yu Pei Ye. 【Poetry·Zheng Feng】Tian Tian Zi Pei. [Biography] Shi Pei Huang Min Er Dian group cogwheel. 【Explanation】Yun, this is also called Yun.　[Pentagram Rhyme] Slave cut, sound 偄. Water rush to the land. One said the city under the field.
Xuan
